instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook Pro 2016 (late) 13" - Keyboard trouble
threads.message:
Honestly lets just make this short:

Is there anything you can do when the spacebar keeps having double or even tripple keystrokes that does not involve replacing the whole keyboard?
Replacing the keyboards on this is so awful that I might rather just give the customer a refund then actually deal with removing every single component again

threads.title: Macbook Pro 2016 (late) 13" - Keyboard trouble
threads.message: Nope it’s just Apple being shitty. Not a lot you can do besides complain to Apple hopefully there’s a recall soon!
